1. Initialize A as 2988348162058574136915891421498819466320163312926952423791023078876139
2. Initialize B as 2351399303373464486466122544523690094744975233415544072992656881240319
3. Initialize M as 10 ** 40
4. Calculate P as the result of the powm function with parameters A, B, and M
5. Print the value of P.
